name: SUDISA - Balatas Analyzer
description: Image classification software using machine learning; automates label printing for detected good condition products; integrates Google Sheets API for seamless cloud-based reporting.

name: OrganizApp
description: Project management web app with user-friendly interface; organizes tasks, promotes team collaboration, and tracks project progress effectively for seamless project management.

name: Steam-Data-Analyzer
description: Data science project analyzes gaming habits using Steam and howlongtobeat data. Utilizes Steam API for game insights, playtime, achievements, and howlongtobeat scraping for game duration information.

name: SADRPETE
description: Cross-platform mobile app uses Google ML Kit API to detect body parts through camera, analyzes angles for postural risk assessment based on RULA and REBA system.

name: Tkinter-Aplications
description: Tkinter Projects repository showcases diverse Python applications, including a multifunctional watch, agenda, and calculator, prioritizing user experience with intuitive interfaces and customization options.
